author: ChaseCares
name: factoriocogfriday
description: A simple cog to post Factorio Friday Facts when they're available.
install_msg:
Thanks for checking out FactorioCogFriday!
If you have any trouble, open an issue [here](https://github.com/ChaseCares/RedBotCogs/issues). To get started run `[p]help fcf`.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
